job title: Research Scientist I – Protein Expression & Conjugation
job description:
Research Scientist I – Protein Expression & Conjugation in Buffalo, NY
AMRI provides global contract research and manufacturing services to the pharmaceutical and biotechnology industries.
The Research Scientist I is an integral part of the AMRI team, contributing to our success by supporting our contract drug discovery research.
Join our talented workforce, where a commitment to excellence and a customer focused attitude is everything. We pursue excellence because our work has the power to improve patients’ lives with the pharmaceuticals we develop and manufacture.
In this role, you will:
  • Perform hands-on laboratory work, such as molecular cloning, protein expression, protein purification and analysis;
  • Collaborate with internal drug discovery teams/areas, such as assay development, cell biology, mass spec and microbiology;
  • Keep laboratory records and generate experiment reports;
  • Communicate to external collaborators or clients.

Qualifications and background to be successful in this role:

Required
  • Basic understanding of DNA and protein related knowledge;
  • Able to learn hands-on biology laboratory techniques;
  • Flexible to accomplish assigned research plan and projects;
  • Able to solve basic math problems such as unit conversions, dilution of solutions, buffers preparation.
Preferred
  • Bachelor’s degree or Master’s degree;
  • Experience in biological laboratory work;
  • Experience in molecular biology and protein purification.
All interested applicants must apply online.
AMRI is an Equal Opportunity Employer, we value diversity and inclusiveness. Minorities/females/veterans/individuals with disabilities/sexual orientation/gender identity are encouraged to apply.
